thread.section_title: Library Hotel by Library Hotel Collection - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Best Stay Ever!
thread.title_full: Best Stay Ever! - Review of Library Hotel by Library Hotel Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: kmmska
title: Best Stay Ever!
text:
The hotel far exceeded our expectations. The staff was great. Everyone was so nice and very informative. They took the extra step at every turn. I would highly recommend this Hotel. When we are in the city again, we will certainly be staying here.
Room Tip: Might opt for the Queen room to have a little extra space. See more room tips
